p: One gram fat of each of the extracted oils from the stored potato chips was dissolved in 10 ml of carbon tetrachloride and 10 ml of thiobarbituric acid was added to it; then, it was centrifuged at 250 g for 5 min, and the supernatant was separated and placed in the water bath for 30 min; after that, the absorbance of reactive substances to TBA was measured at 530 nm. TBA value was expressed as milligrams of malondialdehyde (MDA) equivalents per kilogram sample or as micromoles of MDA equivalents per gram of sample.
